data.name: Accessibility.Call

data.value: wchange colours, contrast levels and fonts

data.value: wCompliance status

data.name: Accessibility.ContactingUs
data.value: wContacting us by phone or visiting us in person

data.name: Accessibility.ContactUs
data.value: wcontact us

data.name: Accessibility.DefraIsCommitted
data.value: wDefra is committed to making its website accessible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018.

data.name: Accessibility.Email
data.value: wemail

data.name: Accessibility.EnforcementProcedure
data.value: wEnforcement procedure

data.name: Accessibility.EqualityAdvisorySupportService
data.value: wcontact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS)

data.name: Accessibility.FeedbackAndContact
data.value: wFeedback and contact information

data.name: Accessibility.FindOutHowTo
data.value: wFind out how to

data.name: Accessibility.HasAdviceOn
data.value: whas advice on making your device easier to use if you have a disability.

data.name: Accessibility.HowAccessible
data.value: wHow accessible this website is

data.name: Accessibility.IfYouAreNotHappy
data.value: wIf you’re not happy with how we respond to your complaint

data.name: Accessibility.IfYouNeedInformation
data.value: wIf you need information on this website in a different format like an accessible PDF, large print, easy read, audio recording or braille:

data.name: Accessibility.LastReviewed
data.value: wIt was last reviewed on

data.name: Accessibility.NavigateUsingKeyboard
data.value: wnavigate most of the website using just a keyboard

data.name: Accessibility.NavigateUsingReader
data.value: wlisten to most of the website using a screen reader (including the most recent versions of JAWS, NVDA and VoiceOver)

data.name: Accessibility.NavigateUsingSpeech
data.value: wnavigate most of the website using speech recognition software

data.name: Accessibility.OurOfficesHaveAudio
data.value: wOur offices have audio induction loops, or if you contact us before your visit we can arrange a British Sign Language (BSL) interpreter.

data.name: Accessibility.PreparationOfThis
data.value: wPreparation of this accessibility statement

data.name: Accessibility.ReportingProblems
data.value: wReporting accessibility problems with this website

data.name: Accessibility.TechnicalInformation
data.value: wTechnical information about this website’s accessibility

data.name: Accessibility.TheEqualityAndHumanRights
data.value: wThe Equality and Human Rights Commission (EHRC) is responsible for enforcing the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No.2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 (the ‘accessibility regulations’).

data.name: Accessibility.TheTestWasCarriedOut
data.value: wThe test was carried out internally using WAVE, a web accessibility evaluation tool.

data.name: Accessibility.ThisAccessibilityStatement
data.value: wThis accessibility statement applies to the ‘Report packaging data’ service.

data.name: Accessibility.ThisStatementWasPrepared
data.value: wThis statement was prepared on

data.name: Accessibility.ThisWebsiteIsFully
data.value: wThis website is fully compliant with the

data.name: Accessibility.ThisWebsiteIsRun
data.value: wThis website is run by the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (Defra).

data.name: Accessibility.ThisWebsiteWas
data.value: wThis website was last tested on

data.name: Accessibility.Title
data.value: wAccessibility statement for ‘Report packaging data’

data.name: Accessibility.WebContentAccessibility
data.value: wWeb Content Accessibility Guidelines version 2.1 AA standard

data.name: Accessibility.WeDontThink
data.value: wWe don’t think there are any accessibility issues with this website.

data.name: Accessibility.WeProvideAText
data.value: wWe provide a text relay service for people who are D/deaf, hearing impaired or have a speech impediment.

data.name: Accessibility.WereAlwaysLooking
data.value: wWe’re always looking to improve the accessibility of this website. If you find any problems not listed on this page or think we’re not meeting accessibility requirements, contact:

data.name: Accessibility.WeveAlsoMade
data.value: wWe’ve also made the website text as simple as possible to understand.

data.name: Accessibility.WeWantAsMany
data.value: wWe want as many people as possible to be able to use this website. For example, that means that you should be able to:

data.name: Accessibility.ZoomIn
data.value: wzoom in up to 400% without the text spilling off the screen

data.name: Accessibility.AbilityNet
data.value: AbilityNet
